article_title: Marketers, Are You Prepared To Disrupt Competitors Before They Disrupt You?

article_metadata.description: This article is by Marsha Lindsay, CEO of brand-marketing firm Lindsay, Stone & Briggs. Disruptive innovation is a hot topic right now. Companies eager to take advantage of the pick-up in the U.S. economy are scrambling to come up with shiny new ideas to capture the money people are now ready to [...]
